p: IR spectra were measured on a Perkin-Elmer 783 spectrometer with KBr disks. UV spectra were taken on a Perkin Elmer Lambda 25 UV/VIS spectrometer. 1H- and 13C-NMR spectra were recorded on a Varian Unity Inova instrument (at 400/100 MHz). EIMS were measured on a Micromass Platform EI-200 GC/MS instrument at 70 eV by direct insertion probe.
